834510.name: XXZ: Squad Trial
834510.description:
In this version of the game the first three missions are available.
In case you purchase a full version of the game, the progress achieved in this version will be saved.

A squad of military officers from the secret base is trying to get access to the air field.
New game mechanics in the already-discovered XXZ world.

  • the squad now consists of 4 people.
  • new mechanics of interacting with enemies.
  • a new class of characters is available – “with a grenade”.
  • 20 missions.
834510.supported_languages: 英语, 俄语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 阿拉伯语, 保加利亚语, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 匈牙利语, 希腊语, 丹麦语, 繁体中文, 简体中文, 韩语, 荷兰语, 挪威语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 罗马尼亚语, 泰语, 土耳其语, 乌克兰语, 芬兰语, 捷克语, 瑞典语, 日语
